summary: A beautiful but imperious princess refuses all offers of marriage, often condemning her suitors to death. The prince of Denmark comes seeking her hand and, aided by magic objects given to him by a mysterious spirit, seeks to win her love.
cast: Clara Pontoppidan|Svend Methling|Peter Jerndorff|Hakon Ahnfelt-Rønne|Mohamed Archer|Bodil Faber|Wilhelmine Henriksen|Lili Lani|Henry Larsen|Frederik Leth|Schiøler Linck|Gerda Madsen|Lars Madsen|Torben Meyer|Karen Poulsen|Musse Scheel|Emilie Walbom|Viggo Wiehe|Zun Zimmermann
keywords: once upon a time in the title|king|prince|fairy tale|princess
title: Der var engang
